pullrequest.title: Add separate package for eigen3 component

content.raw: The issue is that there are eigen3 files that will be included in both the eigen3 component and the `-math5-dev.install` file due to the wildcards. The stackoverflow, said you can install everything, then override the `dh_install` to remove some files from the plain `-dev`. I thought it was necessary to avoid duplicated files, but maybe I'm mistaken?
content.html: The issue is that there are eigen3 files that will be included in both the eigen3 component and the -math5-dev.install file due to the wildcards. The stackoverflow, said you can install everything, then override the dh_install to remove some files from the plain -dev. I thought it was necessary to avoid duplicated files, but maybe I'm mistaken?
